title: 100 years: the Australian story (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

description: A documentary of Australia, one of the world's oldest democracies, this extensive and thorough series traces Australian political history. Themes of empire, independence, multiculturalism and indigenous Australia make up this enlightening series. Politicians, activists, experts and everyday Australians contributed to this powerful, educational documentary.
